metadata.title: CVE-2018-13065 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** ModSecurity 3.0.0 has XSS via an onerror attribute of an IMGelement. NOTE: a third party has disputed this issue because it may onlyapply to environments without a Core Rule Set configured.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-apache package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
